column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Actor Zuko says : " Azula , my sister , what are you doing here ? "
#Text=Actress Azula says : " You caught me .
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " She escaped , but how ?
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " If she continues drilling , this wall will come down for sure !
#Text=" Actress Azula says : " Haha , yes !
#Text=Continue drilling !
#Text=The city of Ba Sing Se can hide no longer !
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " No , Jet !
#Text=What did they do to you ?
#Text=" Actor Jet says : " Must ... serve ... Earth King !
#Text=Must ... destroy !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Did Jet just ... die ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You know , it was really unclear .
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " I have to admit Prince Zuko , I really find you attractive !
#Text=" Actor Zuko says : " You do n't have to make fun of me .
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " But I mean it !
#Text=I 've had eyes for you since the day you first captured me !
#Text=" Actor Zuko says : " Wait , I thought you were the Avatar 's girl !
#Text=" Actress Katara says : " The Avatar ?
#Text=Why , he 's like a little brother to me !
#Text=I certainly do n't think of him in a romantic way .
#Text=Besides , how could he ever find out about ... this ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , you 're getting up ?
#Text=Can you get me some fire flakes ?
#Text=Ooh , and fire gummies !
#Text="
